plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

multiqc_config.description: Custom config file to supply to MultiQC.

user_orfs_faa.description: Path to a protein fasta file for user-provided ORFs.

prodigal_trainingfile.description: Specify a training file for prodigal. By default prodigal will learn from the input sequences

diamond_top.description: Argument to Diamond's `--top` that controls the percentage of hits to include in the LCA.

sequence_filter.description: Fasta file with sequences to filter away before running assembly etc..

bbnorm_min.description: Reads with an apparent depth of under nx will be presumed to be errors and discarded

orf_caller.description: Specify which ORF caller to run. Possible alternatives: prodigal, prokka, transdecoder. This needs to be set unless the `--user_orfs_*` params are set.

max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.

user_assembly.description: Path to a fasta file with a finished assembly. Assembly will be skipped by the pipeline.

hook_url.description: Incoming hook URL for messaging service

save_trimmed.description: Save the trimmed FastQ files in the results directory.

clip_r1.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 1 (or single-end reads).

clip_r2.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 2 (paired-end reads only).

multiqc_logo.description: Custom logo file to supply to MultiQC. File name must also be set in the MultiQC config file

multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime

prokka_batchsize.description: Size of individual files annotated by Prokka in one batch.

email_on_fail.description: Email address for completion summary, only when pipeline fails.

min_contig_length.description: Filter out contigs shorter than this.

bbmap_minid.description: Minimum identity needed to assign read to a contig

skip_qc.description: Skip all QC steps except for MultiQC.

trim_nextseq.description: Instructs Trim Galore to apply the --nextseq=X option, to trim based on quality after removing poly-G tails.

skip_kofamscan.description: If enabled, skips the run of KofamScan.

hmmdir.description: Directory with hmm files which will be searched for among ORFs

bbnorm.description: Perform normalization to reduce sequencing depth.

diamond_dbs.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about Diamond database files you want to use for taxonomy assignment.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

skip_eukulele.description: If enabled, skips the run of EUKulele

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.

save_bam.description: Save the bam files from mapping

user_orfs_gff.description: Path to a gff file for user-provided ORFs.

bbnorm_target.description: Reduce the number of reads for assembly average coverage of this number.

hmmpattern.description: Specify which pattern hmm files end with

spades_flavor.description: Select which type of assembly you want to make. Default: rna

hmmfiles.description: Comma-separated list of hmm files which will be searched for among ORFs

save_bbnorm_fastq.description: Save the resulting fastq files from normalization

user_assembly_name.description: Name to give to the user-provided assembly.

three_prime_clip_r1.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 1 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

three_prime_clip_r2.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 2 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

user_orfs_name.description: Name to give to user-provided ORFs.

multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

kofam_dir.description: Path to a directory with KOfam files. Will be created if it doesn't exist.

assembler.description: Specify the assembler to run. Possible alternatives: megahit, spades.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

pipelines_testdata_base_path.description: Base URL or local path to location of pipeline test dataset files

eukulele_method.description: Specify which method to use for EUKulele. the alternatives are: mets (metatranscriptomics) or  mags (Metagenome Assembled Genomes). default: mets

se_reads.description: Activate when using single end reads input

save_formatspades.description: Save the formatted spades fasta file
